booking.title: Bookings
booking.formInstructions: Fill out the form below to reserve the facility. All information is handled securely and confidentially.
booking.reservationReceived: Your reservation has been received and will be processed. Reference number:
booking.emailConfirmationSent: A confirmation has been sent to your email
booking.smsWhenApproved: You will receive an SMS when the reservation is approved
booking.processingTime: Processing time is usually 1-2 business days
booking.selectTimeSlotsFirst: Select time slots in the calendar first to continue with the booking.
booking.purposeDescription: Describe the purpose of your booking
booking.moreTimeSlotsInZone: more time slots in this zone
